amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Suitable for events - The listing can accommodate a gathering of 25 or more attendees
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
description: Welcome to Kaeo the small town with a Big Spirit.Kaeo is the gateway between the beautiful Bay of Islands and Doubtless Bay. Sabbi's backpackers is conveniently locate above the renowned Spice Grill restaurant and takeaway, ice cream and coffee shop.The spaceThe back packers is a shared facility with a 6 single bedroom dorm and a seperate double bedroom room. There is a shared veranda looking out on to the high street and recreation ground. The kitchen facilities are basic with a fridge and an electric stove top, coffee machine and toaster. The shower is hot, powerful and a highlight, but in summer we do ask our guests to be respectful of the amount of time they spend in the shower as we are on tank water.Guest accessSpice Grill Backpacker Meal Deal$20Rice, Curry, Naan, PapadumsBeer /  Wine / Coffee / DrinkOther things to notePricesShared Room  1x single be(URL HIDDEN) $25 / nightOpen Room	 1x double bed  			 $50/nightShare Room  	Maximum Stay 	1 wee(URL HIDDEN)$150/weekOpen Room	Maximum Stay 	1 wee(URL HIDDEN) $300/weekShared Room	Book 6 beds			$150/night  ExtrasWifi	Free  Washing  	$5
